com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.communications

Class HABufferFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.communications.HABufferFactory

  • public final class HABufferFactory
extends Object
    Factory to be used for creating buffers container data to be sent or received via the HAMessagingSystem.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HABufferFactory

        public HABufferFactory(boolean homogeneousEndianness,
                       boolean supportsUnalignedTypeAccess)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        homogeneousEndianness - True if all cluster nodes have the same endianness, false otherwise.
        supportsUnalignedTypeAccess - True if all cluster nodes hardware platforms support unaligned type access (e.g. x86), false otherwise (e.g. sparc).

    • Method Detail

      • newBufferOnByteBuffer

        public BufferOnByteBuffer newBufferOnByteBuffer(boolean direct,
                                                int capacity)
        Create a new BufferOnByteBuffer with the correct byte ordering and type alignment semantics.
        Parameters:
        direct - True if the underlying byte buffer should be direct, false otherwise.
        capacity - The underlying byte buffer capacity.
        Returns:
        The buffer.

      • newBufferOnByteArray

        public BufferOnByteArray newBufferOnByteArray(int capacity)
        Create a new BufferOnByteArray with the correct byte ordering and type alignment semantics.
        Parameters:
        capacity - The underlying byte array capacity.
        Returns:
        The buffer.

      • newBufferOnByteArray

        public BufferOnByteArray newBufferOnByteArray(BytesSegment segment)
        Create a new BufferOnByteArray with the correct byte ordering and type alignment semantics, layered on top of the specified segment.
        Parameters:
        segment - The underlying segment.
        Returns:
        The buffer.
